mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.num, r.subject, r.addr1, r.addr2, r.room_type, NVL(AVG(rr.rating), 0) AS rating, NVL(COUNT(rr.review_num), 0) AS review_count, MIN(d.price) AS price, r.facility_content AS facility_content, r.key_value AS key_value , r.thumbnail , MIN(d.people) as people, NVL(wishCount, 0) AS wishCount FROM room r LEFT OUTER JOIN ( select COUNT(user_num) AS wishCount, t1.num from room_wish_list t1 join room t2 on t1.num=t2.num group by t1.num ) rl on r.num = rl.num LEFT OUTER JOIN room_detail d ON r.num = d.num LEFT OUTER JOIN room_review rr ON r.num = rr.num and active = 1
instr(subject , #{kwd}) > 0
AND r.room_type=#{roomType}
AND d.price <= 100000
AND d.price > 100000 AND d.price <= 200000
AND d.price > 200000 AND d.price <= 300000
AND d.price > 300000 AND d.price <= 400000
AND d.price > 400000
AND INSTR(key_value, #{arr}) > 0
AND INSTR(FACILITY_CONTENT, #{arr}) > 0
GROUP BY r.num, r.subject, r.addr1, r.addr2, r.room_type, r.facility_content, r.key_value , r.thumbnail, wishCount) tb
ORDER BY tb.wishCount DESC, tb.subject ASC
ORDER BY tb.price ASC, tb.subject ASC
